# Hockey

Hockey is currently supported for the following leagues (in alphabetical order):

```{toctree}
:maxdepth: 1

league-hockey-ahl
league-hockey-echl
league-hockey-iihf
league-hockey-ncaa
league-hockey-nhl
league-hockey-nwhl
league-hockey-ohl
league-hockey-phf
league-hockey-qmjhl
league-hockey-ushl
```

```{eval-rst}
.. automodule:: sportypy.surfaces.hockey
    :members: HockeyRink
```
